com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn

Class ConvolutionLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.lang.NNLayer
      • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn.ConvolutionLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayerPrecision<ConvolutionLayer>, Serializable

    public class ConvolutionLayer
extends NNLayer
implements LayerPrecision<ConvolutionLayer>
    This is the general convolution layer, allowing any number of input and output bands. During execution it delegates processing to a dynamically created subbnet created using SimpleConvolutionLayer and ImgConcatLayer to implement the more general layer contract.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
